text: Pommard is a commune in the Côte-d'Or department and Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region of eastern France. Pommard is near Beaune and on the Route des Grands Crus. The D973 and D17 pass through the commune. Pommard is twinned with Nackenheim, Germany. == Population == == References == Category:Communes in Côte-d'Or
title: Pommard
